_fields.reply: OPTIONAL - response text for simple commands (example: 'Hello World!')
_fields.script: OPTIONAL - script command to execute (required for script type, example: 'python3 script.py')
_fields.cwd: OPTIONAL - working directory for script (default: current directory, example: './scripts')
_fields.allowedGroups: OPTIONAL - array of group IDs for restricted access (example: ['120363123456789012@g.us'])
_fields.param_placeholder: OPTIONAL - parameter description for help text (example: '<parameter>')
